name: course_created
definition: The event is emitted anytime a new course is created by an end user or API request.
trigger: Triggered when a new course is created (or copied).

schema.account_id: The Account id of the updated course.
schema.course_id: The Canvas id of the updated course.
schema.created_at: The time at which this course was created.
schema.name: The name the updated course.
schema.updated_at: The time at which this course was last modified in any way.
schema.uuid: The unique id of the course.
schema.workflow_state: The state of the course (available, claimed, completed, created, deleted).

metadata.user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_14_3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/73.0.3683.103 Safari/537.36
